items.text: slower yorker on offstumps, he steers it with a flat bat to third man
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, coming back in slightly. pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: gets hold of that comes down the track. the ball was short but the batsman had enough momentum to pull it to the midwicket fence
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: first six of the match another short ball, pretty well directed too. But Mushfiqur stays in his crease, transfers weight back and swivels to hook it. Top edges it, but it went over fine leg
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: punched towards point
items.postText:
Ashik: "Liton is playing fabulous here. Taking single is very important an odi match when team is not good position." Thanks Saurabh. Hello all, how are your cardiographs looking?

Handing it over to Varun Shetty now Ibrahim: "Tamim and Mushfiq are playing for so long, and the transformation they have been through make the statistics of their overall career do not worth a nickel.From 2015, Tamim has an average of 57 with a strike rate of 79.37, Mushfiq has an average of 47 with strike rate of 91. When Tamim, Mushfiq fails, Bangladesh also fails (with exception, for example that match against New Zealand). Without Tamim in the squad, Bangladesh's chance of a decent score depends solely on Mushi. "
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, gets forward and flicks to long-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, backs away and chops to short third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: beaten. Short ball slides across Mushfiqur as he looks to cut
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: pulled this time. Still angled across him but he's behind the line outside off as he drags this to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, allows it to come on and drops it into the midwicket region
items.postText: Meshkat: "I don't understand why most of the team's keat colour is among blue,green and red. See the India Afghanistan Sri Lanka they choice their keat Colorado around blue colour.See Bangladesh, Pakistan ,West Indies, Zimbabwe, South Africa their keat color around Green & red. Why these team doesn't choice variation of colourful keat as like football team.Can anybody explain it to me ?" --- This is a great question and also another reason we need more teams playing international cricket. The Netherlands orange...drool...
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full at middle stump, leans in and toe-ends to midwicket with the flick
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short and just outside off, mistimed cut to point's right....Nabi misfields there
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: beautiful. These are the shots that rekindle faith in Liton Das who has had a rather mercurial start to international cricket. Full ball outside off, nice stride to get to it and full balance as he goes inside-out over extra cover
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: oh geez. The very next ball, a shot that typifies his career. Another full ball at off stump, ripping away late after drifting. He's looked to sweep. Not a safe option against Rashid and you'd think he knew that going by the last ball. Top edge hangs up and slip takes it with a couple of steps to his right. A poor, poor shot to end an impressive innings
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Liton Das, OUT

dismissal.text: Liton Das c Ihsanullah b Rashid Khan 41 (43b 3x4 0x6) SR: 95.34

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, gets deep in the crease and taps it to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: direct hit from Shenwari and Shakib is gone! Oh this is disastrous for Bangladesh. Poor judgement from Shakib. Got back to a googly, flicked it to Shenwari's left at midwicket and just took off without a call. Mushfiqur saw no run there and he stood his ground. Shakib slipped as he looked to turn when he realised this and was nowhere in the picture as this throw came in one the bounce to take out the stumps. Mushfiqur had taken a couple of steps down, but it doesn't appear that either of them had made a call
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan run out (Samiullah Shinwari) 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00
